availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Brown (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth A. Smith Brown in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on March 18, 1858. Father of J. Henderson Brown. Physician in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1860. Physician in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 584.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Parksville, p. 139B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 40.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Marriages.
"Useful Life is Ended," The Danville Messenger (Danville, KY), December 22, 1911, p. 4.
